file_content.text: Darth Acina operation = successful // You = rewarded for service // Interactions = concluded
Z1-3C = monitoring reports of Dread Masters activity // You = assist Darth Acina with operation
Darth Acina = requests immediate meeting // You = rendezvous at her coordinates
Organics = identiscans complete // Combined threat level = "extinction" // Mission parameters = precise match
Organic = identiscan complete // Recognized threat level = "nemesis" // Mission parameters = precise match
Incoming transmission = highest priority // You = stand by + prepare for briefing
What an impressive collection of luminaries. Fortune smiles upon me.
The Wrath? Excellent. The Empire's highest executioner will serve nicely.
A recently-elevated peer among our elite. This introduction is long overdue.
Commander. Your exploits with Darth Jadus and his successor qualify you to serve me.
The Empire's greatest bounty hunter. What a perfect match for my needs.
A true Imperial celebrity. You've left quite a mark on the galaxy. Even I have heard of you.
I am Darth Acina of the Dark Council. The Dread Masters have violated an Imperial stronghold and stolen powers they cannot control. You will help me reclaim them.
The Dread Masters have betrayed us all. I will see them stripped of their power and executed for their disloyalty.
These traitors must die.
Well, naturally. But first things first.
Fair warning: I tend to keep powers I claim--especially when they belong to someone else.
I collect power, myself.
You do not want these--but I'm certain we can come to other arrangements.
If you're recruiting me, you must not want the rest of the Dark Council to know what's happened. I take it they wouldn't approve?
You want this handled quietly.
Typical Cipher. Always probing for weaknesses, even where none exist.
I charge by the target. How many of these powers can you afford to buy back from me?
Sure, if you meet my price.
I have access to more enticements than you'll require for this work.
Who are these Dread Masters?
The Dread Masters?
You were on Belsavis when they were freed. I assumed you'd been keeping up with galactic events. They're rogue Sith who've betrayed the Empire.
Considering I've never heard of you, don't count on intimidating me into licking your boots. If you want help, show me respect.
Don't order me around.
Ah, yes--the new Empire, where we are all equally in chaos. Consider it a request, then. One you should not refuse.
I will not discuss the emergency's details over an open channel. Meet me at these coordinates, and all will become clear. Darth Acina out.
Transmission = complete + coordinates uploaded // Darth Acina = waiting for you // For the Empire!
Z1-3C = standby mode + awaiting orders
